full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### RFQ for Ground Based Optical Capability of Surveillance of Space II Project

**Project Reference:** WS3218348164
**Closing Date:** July 24, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, invites interested parties to provide feedback on the draft Statement of Work for the Ground Based Optical (GBO) Capability of Surveillance of Space II Project. This Request for Information (RFI) aims to gather industry feedback and opinions on the project's requirements.

**Tender Description:**
The GBO Capability of Surveillance of Space II Project seeks to develop a ground-based optical system to support the Surveillance of Space II (SOF2) program. The proposed system will be used to monitor space activities and provide critical space situational awareness.

**Key Requirements:**
- The system must be capable of detecting and tracking space objects in low Earth orbit, medium Earth orbit, and geostationary orbit.
- The system must be able to provide accurate and reliable data on space object movements, orbits, and characteristics.
- The system must be designed to integrate with existing space situational awareness systems and tools.

**Submission Guidelines:**
Interested parties must submit their responses to this RFI by July 24, 2023. Responses must be sent to [alan.chan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alan.chan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). The GBO RFI Discovery Page is available at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16421635](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16421635).

**Background Documents:**
The previous two GBO RFIs are available for reference:

- [WS3218348164-Doc3784068396](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/ws3218348164-doc3784068396)
- [PW-ST-047-39773](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-st-047-39773)

**Procurement Method:**
This tender is subject to the selection method of Competitive – Open Bidding.

**Goods and Services:**
The selected bidder will provide the ground-based optical capability for the Surveillance of Space II program.

**Delivery Method:**
The goods and services will be delivered to the Department of National Defence.
